title: As Fourth, First Committees Hold Joint Meeting, Speakers Stress Need for Holistic Handling of Outer ...
text: ( Source : United Nations General Assembly ) Discussion Also Covers International Code of Conduct , Confidence-Building Measures As major cross-cutting issues, outer space security and sustainability must be addressed in a holistic manner
